title:
5 Things to consider when posting Pictures from your Kids:

1. What will they think if they stumble ...

object.content:
5 Things to consider when posting Pictures from your Kids:

1. What will they think if they stumble upon them at age 15?
   _or if someone from school finds it and puts in on a school-pin-board_
2. What will be your explanation for the post?
  are you able and willing to take a stand and explain is so they can understand
3. Do you want the Child's Picture be connected with the Child's Name?
  it will make it possible for strangers to call your Child by it`s name. Something that makes your Child very trustful - and if you do, have you talked and instructed your Child on this?
It is the same thing to consider with Car Family Decals with Names
4. Know the PRO Tips for showing Pictures?
  show Your Children in all those cute positions without actually showing there Face - it is enough and keeps some privacy for them
5. Know the Posting-age guidelines
    - first few month You`re got fool-freedom, they won`t be recognized later
    -_ toddler years_ the most fetal time, being tempted to post potentially                    embarrassing situations for the kids later.
    -8 years and up start with what is basic and respectful knowledge and start asking for permission just as you should do with everyone else - especially Your Wife
    -_ 13 years and up_ Your child needs knowledge on what you intend to post or show publicly because you want to teach them about the right and freedom everyone deserves! 

Don`t freak out, if you have not considered it before! Parenting is about making mistakes and learning from them, just as we expect our kids to do so too. But consider the tips and discuss with your Family and Partner.

To this Post we got Inspired by: https://plus.google.com/u/0/106443559492526864140/posts/HvkR7PNjcuB from +New Parenting Hangout 

#privacyrights   #postinchildrenpictures   #familyprivacy   #familylive
+Baby-joy International Great post, this will help others
Thank you +New Parenting Hangout I hope it will! Its free to share and give around - lol
